metadata.title: CVE-2023-6287 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Sensitive data exposure in Webconf in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before1.6.8 allows local attacker to retrieve passwords via reading log files.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
